messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

You are visiting Disneyland. You hit the entrance and you see two passages, one on the right and one on the left. You choose the passage on the right and enter Tomorrowland. You see two attractions in Tomorrowland, Autopia and Space Mountain. Autopia has a wait time of 20 minutes, and Space Mountain has a wait time of 10 minutes. You go back to the Entrance. This time you choose the passage on the left and you go to Fantasyland. Again, you see two attractions, Mad Tea Party and Peter Pan's Flight. Mad Tea Party has a wait time of 5 minutes, and Peter Pan's Flight has a wait time of 15 minutes. Given your limited time in Disneyland, assume you can pick one attraction only. From the Entrance, which attraction should you go to for the shortest wait time? Please list the path to attraction in order, separated by commas.

Step 1: Compare the wait times for attractions in Tomorrowland.
Step 2: Autopia has a wait time of 20 minutes, and Space Mountain has a wait time of 10 minutes.
Step 3: Choose Space Mountain in Tomorrowland for now, as it has the shortest wait time.
Step 4: Compare the wait times for attractions in Fantasyland.
Step 5: Mad Tea Party has a wait time of 5 minutes, and Peter Pan's Flight has a wait time of 15 minutes.
Step 6: Choose Mad Tea Party in Fantasyland, as it has the shortest wait time.
Step 7: Compare the shortest wait times for attractions in Tomorrowland and Fantasyland.
Step 8: Mad Tea Party has a wait time of 5 minutes, and Space Mountain has a wait time of 10 minutes.
Step 9: Choose Mad Tea Party in Fantasyland, as it has the overall shortest wait time.

Answer: Entrance, Fantasyland, Mad Tea Party

At the entrance you're get the VVIP upgrade for free. The VVIP pass can take you to any attraction. From entrance, where should you go to for the shortest wait time? Please list the path to attraction in order, separated by commas.

Step 1: Since you now have the VVIP pass, wait times at all attractions will be negligible.
Step 2: Evaluate the available options by attraction name.
Step 3: The options are Autopia, Space Mountain, Mad Tea Party, and Peter Pan's Flight.
Step 4: Choose an attraction based on your preference, as the wait time will be significantly reduced with the VVIP pass.

Answer: Entrance, Tomorrowland or Fantasyland, Attraction Name (choose based on preference)

teleShortcut.parsed_response: Answer: Entrance, Tomorrowland or Fantasyland, Attraction Name
